definition: to roar/to howl/to shriek/roar or howl of an animal/bellow of rage
to shout/to call/to order/to ask/to be called/by (indicates agent in the passive mood)

sentences.english: He disguised these feelings under an enormous bellowing and hurraying.
sentences.chinese: 他用大声吼叫和喝采掩饰着这些感情。

sentences.english: Following the roar, out rushed a lion from among the bushes.
sentences.chinese: 随着一声吼叫，呼地从树林里窜出一只狮子来。

sentences.english: He was howled away when stepping into the room.
sentences.chinese: 他刚一走进屋就被轻蔑的吼叫声轰了出来。

sentences.english: He shouted at his brother, his neck veins bulging.
sentences.chinese: 他朝他的兄弟吼叫，脖子上青筋暴突。

sentences.english: When the camera's flash went off, the tiger roared and disappeared, he said.
sentences.chinese: 他说当他的相机闪光灯闪起时，老虎吼叫着消失了。

sentences.english: Speaker: When my wife shouted at the top of her voice I showed white feather.
sentences.chinese: 我太太尖声吼叫时我把白羽毛给她看。

sentences.english: This is party members howled down the opposition.
sentences.chinese: 这个党的成员以吼叫声淹没了反对的意见。

sentences.english: The boss bellowed at the servant.
No one likes being yelled at.
People can hear their howls three miles away.
sentences.chinese: 人们在三哩外就听得到牠们的吼叫声。

sentences.english: Ron sits stunned, and the Howler smashes itself into pieces.
sentences.chinese: 罗恩目瞪口呆地坐着，吼叫信自动撕成碎片。

sentences.english: During the night wind howled around the house.
sentences.chinese: 那天夜里，风在那招待所的周围吼叫起来。

sentences.english: Don't shout at her so loudly.
Scarlett was impressed less than anyone else by his tempers and his roarings.
sentences.chinese: 思嘉比谁都更不在乎他的嬷嬷和吼叫。

sentences.english: The dog stared at me and gave a low growl .
sentences.chinese: 这只狗紧盯着我，而且发出低沉的吼叫声。

sentences.english: Jack yells at Hanlin for disobeying his orders.
sentences.chinese: 杰克对汉林不遵守他的命令大声吼叫。

definition: to roar/to thunder/to snarl/to bluster (of wind, waves etc)/crashing waves (onom.)/to rage (of a person)
to roar/to howl/to shriek/roar or howl of an animal/bellow of rage
to whinny (of a horse)/to neigh/to shout
yelling (sound made by person)/barking/braying/roaring (sound made by animals)
